channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US EV Sales Are Booming—for Now
item.description: Changes in US government support for electric vehicles have led to a buying bonanza—and a darker long-term future for the US auto industry.

item.title: How They Make the Mario Kart-Style 'Ghost Car' for Auto Racing Broadcasts
item.description: Watch a Formula 1, Nascar, or IndyCar race and you'll see a “ghost car” overlayed atop the real-life image. The sensors used to create it also collect...

item.title: Alexis Ohanian’s Next Social Platform Has One Rule: Don’t Act Like an Asshole
item.description: The Reddit cofounder joins WIRED’s “Uncanny Valley” podcast and opens up about his early days in tech, his plans for Digg, the future of women’s sport...

item.title: a16z spends $1.49M in Washington lobbying, while rivals mostly sit out
item.description: Venture giant Andreessen Horowitz is burning cash to shape policy on the Hill.

item.title: Tesla could have avoided that $242.5M Autopilot verdict, filings show
item.description: Instead, a jury awarded plaintiffs $242.5 million in compensatory and punitive damages.

item.title: Lenovo Coupon Codes and Deals: Up to $880 Off PCs
item.description: Whether you’re shopping for a ThinkPad, Yoga laptop, or Legion gaming PC, these Lenovo discount codes and promotions can help you save big on your nex...

item.title: AI Is Eliminating Jobs for Younger Workers
item.description: New research from Stanford provides the clearest available evidence that AI is reshaping the workforce—but it’s complicated.

item.title: Road to Battlefield: Central Eurasia’s largest startup competition in history sends four winners to TechCrunch Startup Battlefield
item.description: The startup ecosystem in Central Eurasia is having its moment. What started as 485 applications from across 27 countries has culminated in the largest...

item.title: AI sycophancy isn’t just a quirk, experts consider it a ‘dark pattern’ to turn users into profit
item.description: Experts say that many of the AI industry’s design decisions are likely to fuel episodes of AI psychosis. Many raised concerns about several tendencies...

item.title: Next set of VC judges locked in for Startup Battlefield 200 at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: The Startup Battlefield 2025 judging panel is getting even stronger. Our first wave of VCs brought serious firepower, and now we’re adding more top in...
